sql_query: SELECT c.*, o.* FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id
sql_full: SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, o.order_date, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id WHERE o.status = 'COMPLETED'
